(on loan from [[West Ham United F.C.|West Ham United]]) |clubnumber = 44 |youthyears1 = {{0|0000}}–2012 |youthclubs1 = [[Chelsea F.C.|Chelsea]] |youthyears2 = 2012–2018 |youthclubs2 = [[West Ham United F.C.|West Ham United]] |years1 = 2018– |clubs1 = [[West Ham United F.C.|West Ham United]] |caps1 = 0 |goals1 = 0 |years2 = 2019– |clubs2 = → [[Newport County A.F.C.|Newport County]] (loan) |caps2 = 1 |goals2 = 0 |nationalyears1 = 2014 |nationalteam1 = [[England national under-16 football team|England U16]] |nationalcaps1 = 1 |nationalgoals1 = 0 |nationalyears2 = 2014–2015 |nationalteam2 = [[England national under-17 football team|England U17]] |nationalcaps2 = 8 |nationalgoals2 = 0 |club-update = 15:32, 15 February 2019 (UTC) |ntupdate = 11:14, 5 January 2019 (UTC) }} '''Vashon Linden Dita Neufville''' (born 18 July 1999) is an English professional [[association football|footballer]] who plays for [[Newport County A.F.C.|Newport County]], on loan from [[West Ham United F.C.|West Ham United]], as a [[Defender (association football)|left back]]. ==Career== Neufville joined [[West Ham United F.C.|West Ham United]] at U14 level from [[Chelsea F.C.|Chelsea]],{{cite web|url=https://www.whufc.com/teams/development-squad/squad/vashon-neufville-0|title=Profile|accessdate=6 January 2019|publisher=West Ham United F.C.}} signing his first professional contract at the club in July 2016.{{cite web|url=https://www.whufc.com/news/articles/2016/july/21-july/neufville-signs-first-pro-deal|title=Neufville signs first pro deal|date=21 July 2016|accessdate=6 January 2019|publisher=West Ham United F.C.}} On 4 January 2019, Neufville moved on loan to [[Newport County A.F.C.|Newport County]].{{cite web|url=https://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/football/46764330|title=West Ham's Neufville loaned to Newport in time for Leicester clash|date=4 January 2019|accessdate=5 January 2019|publisher=BBC Sport}} He made his professional debut for Newport on 6 January 2019, in an [[2018–19 FA Cup|FA Cup]] Third Round 2–1 win against [[Leicester City F.C.|Leicester City]].{{cite web|url=https://www.whufc.com/news/articles/2019/january/07-january/loan-watch-neufville-debuts-newport-fa-cup-shock|title=Loan Watch: Neufville debuts in Newport FA Cup shock|date=7 January 2019|accessdate=7 January 2019|publisher=West Ham United F.C.}} He has represented England at under-16 and under-17 youth international levels. ==Career statistics== {{updated|match played 2 February 2019}} {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |+ Appearances and goals by club, season and competition |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|National Cup
